New Records: Kevin Gausman pitched five no-hit innings before exiting with lower back tightness
Key Match Events: Vladimir Guerrero Jr. hit two solo home runs after Kevin Gausman exited the game
Texas managed only two singles against Gausman and four relievers
Rangers rookie Kumar Rocker (0-1) struck out five, walked four and hit a batter over three innings in his second career start
Post-Match Reflections: The Rangers were officially eliminated from the AL West race, falling 9 1/2 games behind the division-leading Houston Astros with nine games to play
Texas was seven back in the wild-card race
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Blue Jays recorded their ninth shutout victory of the season
The Rangers were held scoreless for the 10th time this season
Blue Jays SS Bo Bichette was put on the injured list with a broken right middle finger after returning for only one game after he had been out more than eight weeks with a calf injury
